snippet: Despite the death of Anwar al-Awlaki, the infamous Yemeni-American cleric and propagandist for aspiring jihadists, Yemen’s battle against Al Qaeda is far from complete.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula

lead_paragraph: Despite the death of Anwar al-Awlaki, the infamous Yemeni-American cleric and propagandist for aspiring jihadists, Yemen’s battle against Al Qaeda is far from complete.

headline.main: In Yemen, One Islamist Is Dead, but the Battle Goes On
headline.print_headline: In Yemen, Unrest Is Persistent Despite Death of a Top Militant
headline.seo: Unrest Continues to Shake Yemen, Especially in South
